1.Ḥarīm bin Thawbān confessed and did 2.penance to Dhū-Samāwī, because he had approached 3.a woman during her forbidden period and had intercourse with a menstruating woman; 4.and because he had entered a woman in childbed; and because 5.he had entered while impure, and he stayed in his 6.impure clothes; and because he had had contact (lit. "touched") a woman 7.while she was on her period and he did not wash himself; and because he had 8.defiled his clothes with semen; and he showed contrition 9.and distress and he will pay a fine. And may he be generous.
